snippet: The Spurs finished 40-1 at home, a mark that matches the home record set by the Boston Celtics in 1985-86.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs beat Oklahoma City Thunder, 102-98, to finish season 40-1 at home, tying 1985-86 Boston Celtics' record; other pro basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Spurs finished 40-1 at home, a mark that matches the home record set by the Boston Celtics in 1985-86.

headline.main: Spurs Tie Celtics’ Mark for Best Record at Home
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Spurs Tie Record With Win
